title: A Dancer Gets Hurt and Leaves a TV Show
summary: La Voix, a performer on the TV show Strictly Come Dancing, had to stop dancing because she got hurt. She is a drag queen, which means she dresses up in fun costumes to entertain people. The show's host, Tess Daly, told everyone that La Voix could not continue on the show after getting advice from doctors. La Voix shared on Instagram that she was sad to leave but would always remember the good times. Because of her injury, no one was voted off the show this week. La Voix is really Chris Dennis, who wanted people to know more about him. She was very popular on another show called RuPaul's Drag Race UK. Other people on the show have also gotten hurt before.

background_read: Strictly Come Dancing is a popular TV dance competition in the UK where celebrities partner with professional dancers to perform and are judged. Drag queens like La Voix are performers who use costumes and makeup to create characters, often in shows or events. Injuries can happen in physical activities like dancing, and sometimes people have to stop to stay safe. Social media platforms like Instagram let people share updates with fans easily.
